This area is traditionally a holiday spot for Spanish people, who generally reside here during the summer months.

The Mar Menor is a shallow sea approx. 20km simply by 10km, parts of it have been completely sectioned off for sodium collection. The average range is 4-5 meters; this is the marine reserve and your breeding place for Sea Horses which are usually protected here.
